rules_text: Once each turn, when a player casts a spell, you may choose two target players. Each of those players exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card with mana value less than that spell’s. They may cast those cards without paying their mana cost. Then they put the rest of the exiled cards on the bottom of their library in a random order. [i](The active player puts their spell on the stack first.)[/i]
